languages.text: "И все же я понял, что должен тебя предупредить — если это можно так назвать. Пускай меня позже обвинят в чем хотят — я должен был дать тебе понять, что настоящей угрозы твоей жизни нет. Потому что..." {n}Он запинается, окончательно путаясь в том, что хочет и не должен говорить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "И все же я понял, что должен тебя предупредить — если это можно так назвать. Пускай меня позже обвинят в чем хотят — я должен был дать тебе понять, что настоящей угрозы твоей жизни нет. Потому что..." {n}Он запинается, окончательно путаясь в том, что хочет и не должен говорить.{/n}

languages.text: "And yet, despite all that, I knew I had to give you fair warning — if you can call it that. Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И все же я понял, что должен тебя предупредить — если это можно так назвать. Пускай меня позже обвинят в чем хотят — я должен был дать тебе понять, что настоящей угрозы твоей жизни нет. Потому что..." {n}Он запинается, окончательно путаясь в том, что хочет и не должен говорить.{/n}

Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}

Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}

Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}

"And yet, despite all that, I knew I had to give you fair warning — if you can call it that. Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}

languages.text: “但即便如此，我还是认为我应该提前警告你一下——如果这可以算得上是警告的话。其他人日后愿意怎么指控我都无所谓，但我必须让你明白，你的生命并没有受到真正的威胁，因为……”{n}他犹豫片刻，不清楚自己究竟想说些什么，也不确信哪些事情绝对不能说。到最后，他陷入了沉默之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet, despite all that, I knew I had to give you fair warning — if you can call it that. Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “但即便如此，我还是认为我应该提前警告你一下——如果这可以算得上是警告的话。其他人日后愿意怎么指控我都无所谓，但我必须让你明白，你的生命并没有受到真正的威胁，因为……”{n}他犹豫片刻，不清楚自己究竟想说些什么，也不确信哪些事情绝对不能说。到最后，他陷入了沉默之中。{/n}

languages.text: «Sin embargo, a pesar de todo esto, sabía que debía advertirle, aunque solo sea de esta manera. Que me acusen de lo que quieran después, pero tenía que informarle de que no hay ninguna amenaza contra su vida. Porque...». {n}Duda, debatiéndose entre lo que quiere decir y lo que no tiene permitido decir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet, despite all that, I knew I had to give you fair warning — if you can call it that. Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, a pesar de todo esto, sabía que debía advertirle, aunque solo sea de esta manera. Que me acusen de lo que quieran después, pero tenía que informarle de que no hay ninguna amenaza contra su vida. Porque...». {n}Duda, debatiéndose entre lo que quiere decir y lo que no tiene permitido decir.{/n}

languages.text: 「それでも、俺はあなたに公正な警告を与えなければならないと思った。後で彼らが望むものは何でも告発させればいい…俺は、あなたの命に対する真の脅威がないことを認識させなければならなかった。なぜなら…」{n}何を言いたいのか、何を言ってはいけないのか、戸惑いのあまり、彼は逡巡した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet, despite all that, I knew I had to give you fair warning — if you can call it that. Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それでも、俺はあなたに公正な警告を与えなければならないと思った。後で彼らが望むものは何でも告発させればいい…俺は、あなたの命に対する真の脅威がないことを認識させなければならなかった。なぜなら…」{n}何を言いたいのか、何を言ってはいけないのか、戸惑いのあまり、彼は逡巡した。{/n}

languages.text: « Malgré tout, je me suis senti obligé de vous prévenir, si on peut appeler cela comme ça. Ils pourront me blâmer plus tard s'ils le souhaitent, mais je me devais de vous avertir que votre vie n'est pas en danger. Parce que... » {n}Il hésite, visiblement déchiré entre ce qu'il veut vous avouer et ce qu'il ne peut pas vous dire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet, despite all that, I knew I had to give you fair warning — if you can call it that. Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Malgré tout, je me suis senti obligé de vous prévenir, si on peut appeler cela comme ça. Ils pourront me blâmer plus tard s'ils le souhaitent, mais je me devais de vous avertir que votre vie n'est pas en danger. Parce que... » {n}Il hésite, visiblement déchiré entre ce qu'il veut vous avouer et ce qu'il ne peut pas vous dire.{/n}

languages.text: "Und dennoch kann ich nicht anders, als Euch eine kleine Warnung auszusprechen – wenn man das überhaupt so nennen sollte. Es ist mir egal, was man mir später vorhalten wird – aber ich musste Euch bewusst machen, dass Euer Leben wirklich nicht bedroht wird. Weil ..." {n}Er zögert und wird am Ende übermannt, da er sich selbst nicht sicher ist, was er sagen will und was er nicht sagen darf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet, despite all that, I knew I had to give you fair warning — if you can call it that. Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}

Weil ..." {n}Er zögert und wird am Ende übermannt, da er sich selbst nicht sicher ist, was er sagen will und was er nicht sagen darf.{/n}

languages.text: "Ancak tüm bunlara rağmen seni dürüst bir şekilde uyarmam gerektiğinin farkındaydım. Diyeceklerime uyarı denirse tabii. Sonra beni istedikleri şeyle suçlayabilirler. Hayatına yönelik hakiki bir tehdit bulunmadığının farkına varmanı sağlamam gerekiyordu. Çünkü..." {n}Tereddüt ediyor. En nihayetinde söylemek istedikleri ve söylememesi gerekenler hususundaki kafa karışıklığına yenik düşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And yet, despite all that, I knew I had to give you fair warning — if you can call it that. Let them charge me with whatever they want later — I had to make you aware that there is no genuine threat to your life. Because..." {n}He hesitates, his confusion about what he wants to say and what he must not say finally getting the better of him.{/n}
